name: Strike
description: Deals x damage to a single target.

name: Defend
description: Reduces incoming damage by 20% until your next turn.

name: Coin_Exchange
description: Exchange a portion of your stats for coins.

name: Lucky_Coin
description: Toss a coin. Heads grants a random buff, tails inflicts a random debuff.

name: All_In
description: Uses all coins to deal random damage between 0â€“999 to a single enemy. The more coins used, the higher the chance of dealing greater damage.

name: Lucky_Punch
description: Deals damage equal to 50% of your attack. If it lands a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 10 instead.
